description: Mount path of the primary file system
name: scale-host-path

description: Cluster ID of the pirimary IBM Spectrum Scale Cluster
name: cluster-id

description: FQDN or IP address of the GUI node of scale cluster that is specified against the Cluster ID parameter
name: gui-host

description: Name of secret for username password to connect to Primary Cluster GUI
name: secret-name

description: Username to connect to Primary Cluster GUI
name: gui-api-user

description: Password to connect to Primary Cluster GUI
name: gui-api-password

description: Cluster ID of the Owning Scale Cluster
name: owning-cluster-id

description: Name of secret used to connect to the Owning Cluster GUI
name: owning-secret-name

description: FQDN or IP address of the GUI node for the Owning Cluster
name: owning-gui-host

description: Username to connect to Owning Cluster GUI
name: owning-gui-api-user

description: Password to connect to Owning Cluster GUI
name: owning-gui-api-password
